metadata.title: CVE-2014-0104 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In fence-agents before 4.0.17 does not verify remote SSL certificates inthe fence_cisco_ucs.py script which can potentially allow forman-in-the-middle attackers to spoof SSL servers via arbitrary SSLcertificates.

criterions.comment: fence-agents: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
